title: Maa Aavida Meeda Ottu Mee Aavida Chala Manchidi
overview: Maa Avida Meedottu Mee Avida Chala Manchidi is a 2003 Indian Telugu film, directed by E. V. V. Satyanarayana and produced by P. Sai Baba. The film stars Srikanth, Naveen and Rasi in lead roles.The film had musical score by Srinivasa Murthy.
